SELECT R.DocReadID AS "DocReadID" ,R.UserID AS "UserID" ,R.UserName AS "UserName" ,TO_CHAR(R.ReadDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') AS "ReadDate" ,R.AdminYN AS "AdminYN" ,R.ProcessID AS "ProcessID" ,R.FormInstID AS "FormInstID" ,FI.FormID AS "FormID" ,F.FormName AS "FormName" ,F.FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix" ,FI.Subject AS "Subject" ,F.Revision AS "Revision" ,FI.InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" ,FI.InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" ,FI.InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" ,FI.InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" ,TO_CHAR(FI.InitiatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') AS "InitiatedDate" ,TO_CHAR(FI.CompletedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') AS "CompletedDate" FROM JWF_DocReadHistory R INNER JOIN JWF_FormInstance FI ON R.FormInstID = FI.FormInstID INNER JOIN JWF_Forms F ON FI.FormID = F.FormID
FI.EntCode = #{EntCode}
AND R.AdminYN = #{sel_State}
AND
FI.Subject FI.InitiatorName F.FormName R.UserName
LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND
FI.InitiatedDate R.ReadDate
BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'0')+1
